page.title: 09A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: I wake up at 7.00 and read until 7.30. In the morning we chat and don't listen to the radio or watch breakfast television. Dad and my brother leave home at 8.15.My brother goes to Grove Comprehensive school and dad works in the National Westminster bank in Market Drayton. I usually walk to school with Mum it isn't very far. I have sandwiches for lunch but you can have school dinners. When I get home I have lots of different clubs to go to like on Monday I go to Tennis,Tuesday I go to Sewing,Wednesday I go to games and Cricket,Thursday I go to Brownies and Youth Club and on Friday I go to Ballet. If I haven't got a club to go to I play outside. In the evening I watch television if there's something to watch, if it's worthwhile.
